contactPage.weWouldLoveToHearFromYou: We would love to hear from you! Whether you have a question, comment, or need support, don't hesitate to contact us.
contactPage.youCanSendUsAnEmailTo: You can send us an email at:
contactPage.weStriveToRespondWithin: We strive to respond within 24-48 hours.

meta.title: Contact Us | TrackMySpend - We're Here to Help
meta.description: Have questions or need assistance? Contact TrackMySpend for support and inquiries. Our team is here to help you manage your finances more effectively and make the most of our tool.

aboutUsPage.aboutUsDescription: Our website was created to allow users to easily track their expenses and gain a better understanding of how their personal finances are being managed. This helps them take control of their financial health and make informed decisions.
aboutUsPage.aboutUsDescription2: We believe that managing personal finances should be simple, accessible, and efficient. Whether you're trying to save more, understand your spending habits, or just keep better track, Track My Expense is designed for people who want to improve their financial well-being.

meta.title: About Us | TrackMySpend - Empowering You to Take Control of Your Finances
meta.description: Learn more about TrackMySpend, the team behind the tool, and our mission to help you track your expenses, optimize your budget, and achieve financial stability. We're committed to empowering individuals to manage their money with confidence.

mainPage.welcomeDescription: Track, manage, and analyze your expenses in one simple tool. Make informed decisions about your money and feel empowered every step of the way.

painPoints.title: Disadvantages of not having a financial tool

benefits.title: Benefits of Managing Your Money Like an Expert!

items.title: Clear Financial Vision
items.description: Understand where every dollar goes and get a full view of your financial situation.

items.title: Increase Savings and Reduce Debt
items.description: Set savings goals, avoid unnecessary expenses, and work towards getting out of debt.

items.title: Awareness of Emotional Spending
items.description: Discover spending patterns linked to your emotions, like impulsive purchases, and make more conscious decisions.

items.title: Financial Peace of Mind
items.description: Reduce financial stress by having a clear plan and staying in control of your money.

items.title: Healthy Spending Habits
items.description: Identify and improve your spending habits for a more balanced and satisfying financial life.

keyFeatures.title: Key Features of TrackMySpend
keyFeatures.description: TrackMySpend provides you with the tools to manage your money effortlessly and gain deep insights into your spending habits.

feature1.title: Track Your Expenses, Income, and Savings
feature1.description: Easily log and categorize your expenses, track income sources, and see how much you’re saving each month.

feature2.title: Visual Financial Insights
feature2.description: Understand your spending habits through detailed pie charts for each month and line graphs that track all your categories over time.

feature3.title: Emotion-Based Spending
feature3.description: Attach emotions to your expenses and gain insights into how your feelings influence your financial decisions.

step1.title: Create an Account
step1.description: Sign up and create your account in seconds. No complicated forms, just your basic information.

step2.title: Add Your Finances
step2.description: Easily input your income, expenses, and savings with a user-friendly interface.

step3.title: Track and Analyze
step3.description: Get detailed reports on where your money is going, how much you’re saving, and more.

step4.title: Reach Your Goals
step4.description: Set financial goals and track your progress. Let TrackMySpend guide you to financial success!

screenShots.title: Explore the TrackMySpend App
screenShots.description: Take a look at the interface and features that help you manage your finances effortlessly.

screenshot4.description: Detailed table of all expense records

screenshot5.description: Monthly totals displayed in a graph

screenshot7.description: Graphs showing total expenses by emotion and satisfaction level

screenshot8.description: Table of total expenses per emotion by category (e.g., sadness: Food, Clothes)

testimonial1.feedback: TrackMySpend changed the way I handle my finances! I now have full control over my expenses and savings.

testimonial2.feedback: TrackMySpend has been a game-changer! It's intuitive, easy to use, and gives me a clear picture of my financial health.

testimonial3.feedback: Using TrackMySpend has simplified my budgeting process. I feel more confident in managing my finances now.

testimonial4.feedback: TrackMySpend helps me stay on top of my spending habits. It's a must-have tool for anyone serious about their finances!

supportPage.title: Support
supportPage.description: Find answers to your questions or get in touch with our support team.
supportPage.getInContactDescription: If you didn't find the answer to your question in our FAQs, you can contact us through any of the following channels.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)
faqs.question1: How can I contact technical support?
faqs.answer1: You can contact our support team by sending us an email at

meta.title: Privacy Policy | TrackMySpend - Your Data, Your Privacy
meta.description: Read TrackMySpend's privacy policy to understand how we handle, protect, and use your personal data. Your privacy is our priority, and we are committed to maintaining transparency in our data practices.

footer.aboutUsDescription: We help you manage, organize, and understand your expenses so that you can better manage your finances.

meta.title: TrackMySpend – Best App to Track Budget and Spending
meta.description: TrackMySpend is the best app for budget tracking and personal finance goals. Easily track spending, manage income, and grow savings for a secure financial future!

structuredData.description: TrackMySpend is the best app for tracking your budget, managing expenses, and achieving personal finance goals.
structuredData.freeTierDescription: Free tier available with basic features
structuredData.lifetimeAccessDescription: Lifetime access with all premium features

tour.endMessage: You’re ready to start managing your money with TrackMySpend. If you need help, don’t hesitate to reach out to us.
tour.step0: Let’s take a quick tour to get you familiar with the features.
tour.step1: First, let's start by adding a saving. Click the 'Add Saving' button to track your savings goals.
tour.step2: Next, add your income. Click the 'Add Income' button to log your earnings.
tour.step3: Now, add your expenses. Click the 'Add Expense' button to record your transactions.
tour.step4: For more advanced insights, head over to the 'Summary' section from the dashboard menu.
